title: Patrick Sikiliza releases Valentine’s Day single featuring Ras Sheehama
desc: %%title%% %%sep%% %%primary_category%% %%sep%% %%sitename%% %%sep%% Namibian artist Patrick Sikiliza is celebrating Valentine’s Day with the launch of a new love single titled ‘Home Away From Home’, featuring reggae legend Ras Sheehama.

title: Woman, 30s, dies following three-car crash in Co Limerick
desc: A woman in her 30s has died following a three-car crash in Co Limerick. The incident happened on the N24 near Grange West, Boher at around 11.10pm last night.

title: ‘Loved students like her own’: Tributes pour in for beloved former PLMGS teacher who dies at 93
desc: She taught at the school for half a century and “nobody would say they didn’t love her”, said a former student. Read more at straitstimes.com.

title: India vs Pakistan Press Conference LIVE, T20 World Cup 2026: Pak Skipper's Blunt 'Spirit Of Cricket' Message Ahead Of India Clash
desc: India vs Pakistan Press Conference, T20 World Cup 2026 Live Updates: Pakistan captain Salman Agha has given a bold opinion on the 'spirit of cricket' for the match. India skipper Suryakumar Yadav is set to speak later today.

title: Noida couple found dead in car on Valentines Day
desc: The bodies of Sumit and Rekha were found with gunshot wounds in a Tata Altroz near Noida Sector 39. Initial probe has suggested that Sumit first shot Rekha before turning the pistol on himself.

title: Smashing Liek Hou gets early CNY cheer by winning ninth world title
desc: PETALING JAYA: Para badminton ace Cheah Liek Hou clinched his ninth World Championship title after swiftly defeating Taiwan's Fang Jen-yu in Manama, Bahrain on Saturday (Feb 14).

title: When will Cristiano Ronaldo retire? Portugal boss Roberto Martinez explains why CR7's playing career could go 'on and on and on'
desc: Portugal manager Roberto Martinez believes Cristiano Ronaldo could play "on and on and on" if he wanted to, as questions over the 41-year-old's future in the game intensify with each passing day. Ronaldo is almost certain to lead his country at the 2026 World Cup this summer in what is likely to be his international swansong, but it's still unclear when he will retire from the game entirely.

title: 'They're in a relegation battle!' - Peter Crouch demands Mauricio Pochettino return as Tottenham 'dragged on' Thomas Frank sacking
